languages.text:
Each consequent attack made by the Mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy deals {uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks.
Using {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} again resets this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Each consequent attack made by the Mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy deals {uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks.
Using {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} again resets this effect.

languages.text: Each subsequent {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.
languages.original_text: Каждое следующее {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} кибермастифа по {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цели захвата{/g} наносит на {uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} больше урона. Суммируется и длится до следующего использования способности {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Взять!{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each subsequent hit scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks but resets when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

Each subsequent {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

Each subsequent {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

languages.text: Siber mastifin {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} düşmana yaptığı her {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g}, bir öncekine göre +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} daha fazla hasar verir. Etki üst üste birikebilir. Birikimler, {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Göz Hapsine Al!{/g} kabiliyeti tekrar kullanıldığında sıfırlanır.
languages.original_text: Each subsequent {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastifin {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} düşmana yaptığı her vuruş, bir öncekine göre +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} daha fazla hasar verir. Etki üst üste birikebilir. Birikimler, {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Göz Hapsine Al!{/g} kabiliyeti tekrar kullanıldığında sıfırlanır.

Siber mastifin {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} düşmana yaptığı her vuruş, bir öncekine göre +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} daha fazla hasar verir. Etki üst üste birikebilir. Birikimler, {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Göz Hapsine Al!{/g} kabiliyeti tekrar kullanıldığında sıfırlanır.

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} adicional que el cibermastín asesta al enemigo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g} inflige +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} más de daño. Este efecto es acumulativo, pero las acumulaciones se reinician si se vuelve a usar {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}¡Apresa!{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each subsequent {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

traits.locale_text: Cada impacto adicional que el cibermastín asesta al enemigo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g} inflige +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} más de daño. Este efecto es acumulativo, pero las acumulaciones se reinician si se vuelve a usar {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}¡Apresa!{/g}.

languages.text: 生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}处于{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}状态的敌人时，每次后续攻击造成的伤害都会提高{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03}点。此效果可叠加，当监察官再次使用{g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}逮捕！{/g}能力时，此效果重置。
languages.original_text: Each subsequent {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

traits.locale_text: 生化獒犬命中处于{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}状态的敌人时，每次后续攻击造成的伤害都会提高{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03}点。此效果可叠加，当监察官再次使用{g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}逮捕！{/g}能力时，此效果重置。

languages.text: Jeder folgende {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} des Cyber-Mastiffs bei dem {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefassten{/g} Gegner verursacht +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} mehr Schaden. Stapelbar. Stapel werden zurückgesetzt, wenn {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Fass!{/g} erneut eingesetzt wird.
languages.original_text: Each subsequent {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

traits.locale_text: Jeder folgende Treffer des Cyber-Mastiffs bei dem {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefassten{/g} Gegner verursacht +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} mehr Schaden. Stapelbar. Stapel werden zurückgesetzt, wenn {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Fass!{/g} erneut eingesetzt wird.

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} supplémentaire porté par le cyber-mastiff contre l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g} inflige +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} dégâts supplémentaires. Cumulable. Les cumuls se réinitialisent chaque fois que la capacité {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Appréhende !{/g} est utilisée de nouveau.
languages.original_text: Each subsequent {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} scored by the cyber-mastiff against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy deals +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} more damage. Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.

traits.locale_text: Chaque coup supplémentaire porté par le cyber-mastiff contre l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g} inflige +{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03} dégâts supplémentaires. Cumulable. Les cumuls se réinitialisent chaque fois que la capacité {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Appréhende !{/g} est utilisée de nouveau.

languages.text: {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}敵に対するサイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}につき、追加で+{uip|Damage|c3cffc6b88cb47f3867b194fbcdb8b03}のダメージを与えるこの効果はスタックする。{g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}捕まえろ！{/g}が再び使用されると、スタックはリセットされる。

Stacks. Stacks reset when {g|f:078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}Apprehend!{/g} is used again.
